passage_text: Connecting devices to the computer. The computer has an HDMI-in port and an audio-out/audio-in jack on the left side of the monitor. Connecting to an HDMI device. Connect an HDMI device to your computer with an HDMI cable or a micro-HDMI to HDMI cable. Cables can be purchased at most stores that sell electronics.
